english.query: What is the capital of UAE?
english.response:
The United Arab Emirates (UAE) does not have a traditional prime minister. Instead, it has a President and a Deputy President, who are both elected by the Federal Supreme Council. The head of government is the Prime Minister, but in 1971, when the UAE was formed, Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan became the country's first Prime Minister.
However, since the death of Sheikh Zayed in 2004, the title "Prime Minister" has been retained as a ceremonial position, while the actual head of government is the Crown Prince or other senior officials.
رئيس الوزراء في الإمارات العربية المتحدة هو مساعد الرئيس والوزير الأول، وهو عادةً أحد أفراد العائلة المالكة أو شخص ذو صلة عائلية، يعتمد على الرأي الشخصي للرئيس.
في حال عدم وجود قائد عسكري، يتم تعيين وزير الدفاع أو وزير الإدارة كرئيس الوزراء.
The United Arab Emirates (UAE) was formed on December 2, 1971, when seven emirates (Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain, Ras Al Khaimah, and Fujairah) gained independence from the United Kingdom.
However, the history of the UAE dates back to the 18th century, when the region was ruled by various tribes and emirates. The seven emirates that made up the modern UAE were previously separate entities:
In 1952, the emirates were unified under a single ruler, Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, who became the president of the UAE when it gained independence from the UK in 1971.
تأسست الإمارات العربية المتحدة في 2 ديسمبر 1971، عندما أنشأت إحدى السبع إمارات التي تكوّن منهاها من قبل وطنيها الحالي، عندما انضمت السبع إمارات في 27 يناير 1971 في المقرر رقم 35، بمناسبة التحرير من الإدارة البريطانية.
The capital of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) is Abu Dhabi. However, Dubai is often mistaken as the capital due to its economic and business significance.
Abu Dhabi has been the official capital of the UAE since 1971, when the country was formed. The city is home to the presidential palace, the national museum, and many government institutions.
Dubai, on the other hand, is a major commercial center and one of the most populous cities in the UAE, known for its futuristic architecture, shopping malls, and business hub.

عاصمة الإمارات العربية المتحدة هي أبوظبي.
